label: Calculate the average uptime of the conveyor belt
snippet:
#Average uptime of the conveyor belt 
import json


def calculate_average_uptime(uptime_values):
    total_uptime = sum(uptime_values)
    num_uptime_values = len(uptime_values)

    if num_uptime_values == 0:
        return 0.0

    average_uptime = total_uptime / num_uptime_values
    return average_uptime


# Example usage:
uptime_values = [99.5, 98.2, 99.8, 99.0, 99.4]
average_uptime = calculate_average_uptime(uptime_values)
print("Average Uptime: {:.2f}%".format(average_uptime))
